s0101: Initially, Duke Ling of Wei had a favored concubine named Nan Zi.
s0102: Duke Ling crown prince Kui Tun offended Nan Zi, feared execution fled.

s0177: Lu, difficult attack country, its city thin with low, its land narrow with leaking, its jun foolish not benevolent, ministers false without use, its scholars people moreover hate armor weapons matters, this cannot battle with.
s0179: Wu, city high with thick, land broad with deep, armor firm with new, soldiers selected with full, heavy equipment elite troops all in midst, moreover make bright grand master guard it, this easy attack."

s0185: Now jun break Lu to broaden Qi, battle victory to make jun arrogant, break country to honor ministers, jun merit not share, then relation daily distant from jun.
s0186: This jun above arrogant jun heart, below indulge ministers, seek accomplish great matters, difficult.
s0187: Jun arrogant then indulgent, ministers arrogant then contend, this jun above with jun have retreat, below with ministers contend.
s0188: Thus, jun stand in Qi dangerous.
